segments.text: I see two children conspiring in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar, what a cheeky fellow!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is labeled “COOKIE JAR” so clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing by, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is raised, ready to catch a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret mission for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink remains completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how they think they’re being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of mischief is quite endearing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
